name: The Youngest Son of the Eunhae Merchant Group
author: Shin Seo-ram
content: The youngest son of the Eunhae Merchant Group.Eun Seoho was born with an unmatched talent for business.&quotWhy is the Martial Alliance after me...?&quot&quotThey say the higher-ups in the Alliance found you bothersome. All because of your money.&quotKilled by the sword of the so-called righteous Martial Alliance, I suddenly return to the day I first began learning the trade. This time, I swear I won&#039t live with any regrets.&quotI&#039ll bring you down with the money you looked down on.&quot
